title: The GTFS Realtime source schema of the Mobility Catalogs.

data_type.description: The data format that the source uses, e.g gtfs, gtfs-rt.

name.description: An optional description of the data source, e.g to specify if the data source is an aggregate of multiple providers, or which network is represented by the source.

static_reference.description: The unique identifier (mdb_source_id) of the GTFS Schedule static reference for this GTFS Realtime source. Although optional, if not provided, the location of this source will be set to unknown.

realtime_vehicle_positions.description: URL that serves the Vehicle Positions entities for this GTFS Realtime source.

realtime_trip_updates.description: URL that serves the Trip Updates entities for this GTFS Realtime source.

realtime_alerts.description: URL that serves the Service Alerts entities for this GTFS Realtime source.
